name: dewey
description: Knowledge base management plugin for Claude Code - scaffold, curate, validate, and explore structured knowledge bases

skills.name: init
skills.description: Bootstrap a new knowledge base with the standard directory structure, AGENTS.md, and content templates

skills.name: curate
skills.description: Add, propose, promote, and ingest content in a knowledge base following the KB specification

skills.name: health
skills.description: Validate knowledge base quality, check freshness, analyze coverage gaps, and generate health reports

skills.name: explore
skills.description: Discover what knowledge domains to capture through guided conversation about your problems, tasks, and goals
